item.description:
Got this message from Michael from the Boston Area Motorcycle Riders.

Hi Paul,

I am extending an invitation to the GBSC group from the
Boston Area Motorcycle Riders Group.

We are a group of motorcycle enthusiasts from all over
Boston who ride a diverse range of motorcycles and we want to
meet new people too!

The Museum is located in Lincoln, Mass and is a great place to
find friends, fun and outdoor sculptures that are life size!
After 5pm the entrance to the park is free, so we avoid the $12
charge by arriving at 5pm!

The ride will take us on yet another trip of tree covered winding roads made for motorcycle riding enthusiasts like ourselves. Meet at 4:15 meetup time at Jam N Java on Mass ave in arlington. We leave at 4:30 sharp.


Here's a link to help you decide:

http://www.decordova....
item.name: DeCordova Museum Meetup with the Boston Motorcycle folks
